INFO:

On the official day of the album&#039;s CD / Vinyl release, people realized 
that the Guitar Hero III - which became available for download the 
same day - versions of the album&#039;s songs were amazingly not brick-walled, 
like the official CD / Vinyl versions. 

The Guitar Hero III versions were then recorded and encoded into FLAC files.
Then they were transcoded to Wave using FLAC Frontend 1.2.1b -> Normalized and then 
Transcoded to 320Kbps MP3 using Adobe Audition 3.

This is the best out there, and if you do love Metallica, 
go out and buy their album.

Enjoy!
